subsection.subsectiontext: The Lieutenant Governor in Council may make regulations considered appropriate to

paragraph.paragraphtext: more effectively bring this Act into operation, and
remedy any transitional difficulties encountered in doing so,

section.subsandwich: and, for that purpose, the Lieutenant Governor in Council may, by regulation, disapply or vary any provision of this Act.

subsection.subsectiontext: A regulation made under this section may be made retroactive to a date not earlier than the coming into force of this section.
Subject to subsection (4), this section is repealed on the date that is 2 years after the coming into force of this section and on its repeal any regulations made under it are also repealed.
The Lieutenant Governor in Council by regulation may substitute a date that is no later than 3 years after the coming into force of this section for the date referred to in subsection (3).
